name: Monster Path
description:
Monster Path is a JRPG/roguelike about building a party of monsters while journeying from West to East through procedurally generated paths and biomes. The battle system is inspired by classic turn based RPG games, but each monster you add to your party gives you stacking roguelike power ups. The game features light questing/deck building elements that are based on which enemies you release/befriend.

Gameplay

  • Select the optimal path to move through each biome
  • Balance risk and reward as you choose which enemies to fight and which power ups to stack
  • Complete quests as you move through the biome to change the future monsters and game ending
  • 35+ Monsters to befriend, each with unique power ups
  • 9 biomes, 6 unique companions, and 50 moves to compliment your build and play style
